alert.note: Alert for Garland; Montgomery (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 8:29PM CDT until June 25 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN PERRY...NORTHWESTERN GARLAND...NORTHWESTERN SALINE...SOUTH CENTRAL YELL AND NORTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 828 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles south of Plainview in Yell County, or 16 miles south of Danville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lena Landing Rec Area... Mt Tabor... Hollis... Onyx... Fourche Mountain Recreation Are... Hamilton... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
